sub_fields.label: Segment Percent %
sub_fields.name: segment_percent
sub_fields.instructions: Total of all rows should equal 100%

sub_fields.label: Column Headings Repeater
sub_fields.name: column_headings_repeater
sub_fields.instructions: Max 6 headings for max 6 columns. Unlimited rows.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions:
Write this with simple HTML e.g. Office 1
121 King St, Boston
Phone: 123-456-1234

sub_fields.label: ID / Category
sub_fields.name: id_category
sub_fields.instructions: Choose value from Categories OR Posts, not both.

sub_fields.label: Table
sub_fields.name: table
sub_fields.instructions: IMPORTANT: Click on Format > Reset Table Size below before saving.
sub_fields.default_value:
Column 1 Column 2 Column 3 Column 4
data 1a data 1b data 1c data 1c
data 2a data 2b data 2c data 2d
